# Use cases

Learn how web scraping and browser automation with Apify can help grow your business.

[**Data for generative AI** Feed your vector databases and train your LLMs with data extracted from the web.](data-for-generative-ai)[**Lead generation** Find new potential customers and collect data about them at scale.](/use-cases/lead-generation)[**Machine learning** Generate large-scale datasets from the web for the training of your artificial intelligence models.](/use-cases/machine-learning)[**Market research** Monitor your online competitors and automatically react to changes in their prices.](/use-cases/market-research)[**Price comparison** Monitor your online competitors and automatically react to changes in their prices.](/use-cases/price-comparison )[**Product development** Build new products and services on top of existing web apps and data sources.](/use-cases/product-development)[**Product matching AI** Merge datasets of identical products with our all-in-one product-matching RPA.](product-matching-ai)[**RPA – Robotic Process Automation** Monitor your online competitors and automatically react to changes in their prices.](/use-cases/rpa)[**Sentiment analysis** Supply your sentiment analysis projects with real-time web data no matter whether it’s tweets, comments, product reviews, or news articles.](/use-cases/sentiment-analysis)[**Universal web scrapers** Save development time and start your web scraping project with ready-to-use boilerplate code.](store/scrapers/universal-web-scrapers)[**AI chatbot** Convert your website, blog, or FAQ into a chatbot-ready format.](use-cases/ai-chatbot)[**AI web data monitoring** Gather, process, and analyze web data to stay ahead in your industry.](/use-cases/ai-monitoring)
